issue.title: [C++] GcsFileSystem *File classes fail to report errors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reading and/or writing from or to closed files should fail, but does not.  We probably are not checking `stream.good()` (or `stream.bad()`) in the underlying stream, or failing to check if the stream is closed.
